title: the Minister for Justice conferred on her by or under the enactments specified
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Justice (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Justice (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) (No. 3) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited justice (delegation ministerial functions) (no 3) order 2021

title: the Minister for Justice conferred on her by or under the enactments specified
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Justice conferred on her by or under the enactments specified 
in the Schedule are delegated to James Browne, Minister of State at the 
Department of Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [594] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister justice conferred enactment specified schedule delegated james browne minister state department justice notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 19th november 2021 594 3

title: the Minister for Justice conferred on her by or under the enactments specified
heading: Betting Acts 1931 to 2015
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Betting Acts 1931 to 2015 

Firearms Acts 1925 to 2009 

Part III of the Firearms and Offensive Weapons Act 1990 (No. 12 of 1990) 

Gaming and Lotteries Acts 1956 to 2019 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [594] 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

9 November, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [594] 5
text_norm: schedule betting act 1931 2015 firearm act 1925 2009 part iii firearm offensive weapon act 1990 (no 12 1990) gaming lottery act 1956 2019 4 594 given official seal government 9 november 2021 micheal martin taoiseach 594 5

title: the Minister for Justice conferred on her by or under the enactments specified
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the delegation of functions of the Minister for Justice 
to James Browne, Minister of State at the Department of Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 6 [594]
